metadata.title: CVE-2020-27788 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read access vulnerability was discovered in UPX inPackLinuxElf64::canPack() function of p_lx_elf.cpp file. An attacker with acrafted input file could trigger this issue that could cause a crashleading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
